mapper.select: SELECT member_id, member_name, member_email, member_phone, member_num FROM c_member WHERE TRIM(LOWER(member_name)) = TRIM(LOWER(#{memberName})) AND TRIM(LOWER(member_email)) = TRIM(LOWER(#{memberEmail}));
SELECT member_id, member_name, member_email, member_phone, member_num FROM c_member WHERE TRIM(LOWER(member_name)) = TRIM(LOWER(#{memberName})) AND member_phone = #{memberPhone}

SELECT m.member_id, m.member_name, m.member_email, m.member_phone, m.member_num, c.company_num FROM c_member m LEFT JOIN c_company c ON m.company_id = c.company_id WHERE c.company_num = #{companyNum} AND m.member_num = #{memberNum}
